s: Summary: “Beyond Scaling: The Age of Autonomous DeFi” side event exploring AI‑driven on‑chain autonomy.
Topics: AI trading bots, autonomous liquidity management, prediction markets, security infrastructure.
Speakers: Keynotes from Meet48, DeBridge, Paradex, Phoenix Finance and a panel of infrastructure partners.
r: Gain front‑row insight into AI‑enabled DeFi innovations.
Connect with leading infrastructure providers shaping autonomous finance.
Identify investment theses in next‑generation intelligent liquidity.
